definition: single chain/refers to RNA as opposed to the double helix DNA
chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain

sentences.english: Mammalian cells make only the single-stranded variety.
sentences.chinese: 哺乳動物細胞只能產生單鏈RNA。

sentences.english: Structurally, RNA is a single-stranded structure.
sentences.chinese: 從結構來看，RNA是單鏈結構。

sentences.english: C-sf22 lead single node chain and the addition of data can be deleted.
sentences.chinese: sf22帶頭結點的單鏈表，可以刪除添加數據。

sentences.english: Objective To construct a phage display library of human single-chain Fv antibodies against blood group A substance.
sentences.chinese: 目的構建人源抗紅細胞A抗原單鏈噬菌體抗體庫。

sentences.english: This part provides two efficiency methods for ssDNA immobilization.
sentences.chinese: 該研究爲單鏈DNA的固定提供了有效的新方法。

sentences.english: Chain is one of the critical parts composing the mono- chain cold- drawing pipe mill.
sentences.chinese: 鏈條是單鏈冷拔管機的關鍵部件。

sentences.english: For containers with unique keys I store the buckets in a single-linked list.
sentences.chinese: 對於唯一鍵的容器，我將桶保存在一個單鏈表中。

sentences.english: Geminiviruses are a group of single-stranded circular DNA viruses with twinned particles occurring worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 雙生病毒是一類具有孿生顆粒的單鏈環狀DNA病毒。

sentences.english: Any of a group of enteroviruses that can cause a disease resembling poliomyelitis but without paralysis.
sentences.chinese: 病毒小，由核糖核酸單鏈構成，能在植物中引起疾病。

sentences.english: Its hyperchromic effect of slowly increasing the temperature is characterestic for single-strand RNA.
sentences.chinese: 核酸溫度熔解曲線的測定證明它是一個單鏈的RNA。

sentences.english: Individual strands of ultra-pure glass conduct light from remote sources.
sentences.chinese: 單鏈的超純玻璃從遠程來源進行光。

sentences.english: Singly linked lists are a powerful abstraction that allow you to represent numerous types of data.
sentences.chinese: 單鏈表是讓您可以描述多種類型數據的一種有效抽象。

sentences.english: The base line can be set out as a single or double chain.
sentences.chinese: 基線可作爲一條單鏈系或雙鏈系。

sentences.english: The finite-time stabilization problem of single chained system is investigated in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 主要研究了單鏈鏈式系統的有限時間鎮定問題。
